about_the_game:
Get ready for heart-pounding action in Speedy 500, where the roar of engines and the smell of burning rubber fill the air. This adrenaline-fueled racing game pays homage to the iconic Speedianapolis 500 & 90s arcade racing games, combining high-speed thrills with strategic manoeuvring. Here’s what awaits you on the track:

It’s the day of the prestigious Speedy 500, held at the legendary Speedianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit. The stands are packed, and the tension is palpable. You step into the shoes of a skilled race driver, aiming for victory. Your goal? To conquer 500 miles of intense racing, battling competitors, mastering pit stops, and navigating treacherous turns.

Features:
  • Authentic Cars: Choose from a line-up of meticulously modelled race cars, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.
  • Arcade Physics: Experience the thrill of high-speed racing with arcade-based handling. Feel the g-forces as you hug the corners and accelerate down the straightaways.
  • Dynamic Weather: The weather can change in an instant. Rain-soaked tracks demand caution, while sunny skies allow you to push the limits.
  • Pit Stops: Manage tire wear, fuel levels, and repairs during pit stops. A well-executed stop can make or break your race.
  • Challenging Tracks: The iconic oval track of the Speedianapolis Motor Speedway Circuit awaits. Master the art of drafting, slingshotting, and maintaining speed through the turns. Several other road courses are also included. Nail those hairpin turns, and strategically use the long straights to overtake opponents.
  • Hall of Fame: Join the ranks of racing greats by winning multiple Speedy 500 championships.

Speedy 500 isn’t just a race; it’s a quest for immortality. Strap in, rev those engines, and chase the chequered flag. The countdown begins—500 miles await!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
